name: Hyper Pinball
description:
Hyper Pinball is a small game I made for a class project in January. Honestly, the singleplayer is meh but everyone who played the multiplayer found it fun. There was originally planned to be a Climb mode  where you just try to keep hitting the ball as high as you can. I didn't have time to do it justice though so I didn't include it. The button is there as a reminder of what could've been.

Anyway, the menu music is either "The Tale of Ehrgeiz" from Ehrgeiz or "サンジとウソップ(Sanji and Usopp)" from One Piece. The in game music is the Lucio Ball music from Overwatch. Yeah enjoy!
